text: A red box is a device that people used illegally in the 20th century to make free telephone calls at a payphone. It worked by playing back the same sounds that the payphone sends to the phone company when coins are put into it. ==Related pages== *Blue box == Other websites == * "Frequently Asked Questions About Red Boxing" by Mr. Sandman * All about the Red Box and related devices * Red Boxing For Dummies Category:Telephone category:Electronics
title: Red box
